{"step_by_step_thinking": "Erenumab is a medication that is used to prevent migraines. It works by blocking the activity of a molecule in the body that is involved in migraine attacks. Trigeminal neuralgia, on the other hand, is a chronic pain condition that affects the trigeminal nerve, which carries sensation from your face to your brain. While both conditions involve the nervous system, they are distinct and have different causes and treatments. There is currently no scientific evidence to suggest that erenumab is effective for treating trigeminal neuralgia.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
